articles.author: Chetan Narula
articles.title: Stunning Reversal in Edgbaston: Who will figure out India’s Test problems? - News18
articles.description: Should R Ashwin have played in this fifth Test? Perhaps, especially after he sat out all four Tests last summer. In hindsight, playing Shardul Thakur on this surface made little sense and India should have fielded both Ashwin-Jadeja for this Test
articles.content: At stumps on day three at Edgbaston, India was 125-3 at stumps. It meant a lead of 257 runs with seven wickets in hand. Cheteshwar Pujara and Rishabh Pant were set and unbeaten, with Shreyas Iyer, Ra… [+6570 chars]
